messages.title: The positive choice!
messages.content: Lucy Hurds. 3 reasons to back Lucy Hurds tomorrow

mentions.candidate: Lucy Hurds has already worked for years to help local people.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Tomorrow’s election is set to be a close finish between local Lib Dem Lucy Hurds and Bill Wiggin. Only Lucy can beat Bill a vote for anyone else helps elect Bill Wiggin.

contactInformation.address: Published and promoted by Lindsay Northover on behalf of Lucy Hurds, both North Herefordshire Liberal Democrats, PO Box 26, Leominster, HR6 6YP

images.caption: Lucy Hurds pictured in a rural setting.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet focuses on endorsing Lucy Hurds as the 'positive choice' and presents an argument for tactical voting without providing a detailed policy platform or personal statement.
